ContactForm.heading: Contact Us
ContactForm.subHeading: Send your message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactForm.name: Name and Surname
ContactForm.success: Your message has been sent successfully.
ContactForm.error: An error occurred while sending your message.
ContactForm.invalidNameError: Name and surname must be at most 50 characters long.
ContactForm.invalidMessageError: Message must be at most 500 characters long.
